EmailTemplate.name: 202004_Americas_GDT_Buy-More_Email.GDT Buy More - 1B parts for sale - Internal
EmailTemplate.subject: GoDirect Trade and All Sellers Remain Open Online, 24/7
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
As the world evolves in reaction to recent events, we must evolve, too. We will inevitably migrate away from traditional face-to-face meetings, phone calls, and email RFQsâ€”and move to pure online transactions. GoDirect Trade and its sellers are open online 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
In March, we added more sellers and an additional $1B in inventory. Despite the challenging environment, search activity on our marketplace has increased 20%. GoDirect Trade is making it easy to search for parts and even easier to checkout. Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/GDT%20Parts%20Numbers%20List%20March%202020.xlsx]]> for a list of part numbers available on GoDirect Trade (search the site to see price). SHOP ONLINE NOW <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Buy_More]]> Stay healthy, stay safe, and take care,
Lisa Butters GoDirect Trade <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=Seller_Wizard]]>, General Manager Powered by Honeywell
